title: LET ME DIE
lyrics:
Nah, nah, nah, ayy, ya, ya
I'm so done, I take my blood and drop that in your bitch
I’ve been thinking 'bout your lies since I was just a kid
Pussy niggas always talking 'cause they got no bling
I don’t worry 'bout no bullshit unless you take my ring

Let me die, let me die, let me die, bitch

Let me die, let me die, let me die, bitch (sweet)

Let me die, let me die, let me die, bitch

Let me die, let me die, let me die, bitch, ayy



Roll it for these niggas and they where I go with gang

I don't do no talking, all these pussies know my name

You said that you love me, I'm your light skin Novocaine

All you do is tell me lies and who's to blame

Watch me drown inside your mind, I give you all my shit

Ride me through the night lil bitch, I know you like this dick

Find my in the grass, I'm laying over all my sins

Why you touch my face a bit

Look at all these woman, they callin' (Callin' callin yeah)

Ring, ring, ring, get on my phone, they say they want me (Say they want me)

Still I fold these niggas like they origami

I could take your life and mine, kamikaze (Kamikaze) ayy



I’m so done, I take my blood and drop that in your bitch

I’ve been thinking 'bout your lies since I was just a kid

Pussy niggas always talking ’cause they got no bling

I don't worry 'bout no bullshit unless you take my ring

Let me die, let me die, let me die, bitch

Let me die, let me die, let me die, bitch (sweet)

Let me die, let me die, let me die, bitch

Let me die, let me die, let me die, bitch, ayy
